attributes.action: create a department charged with the research, development, and distribution of free mechanised walking battle tanks to all British citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Terrorists threaten the country. The police spend time dealing with petty arguments. Car accidents are one of our biggest killers. I have come up with a solution that will deal with all these.

We must be given mechs.

Imagine, if you will! Men, women and children, traversing the country in robotic walking battle tanks! See a terrorist? No more running and hiding; blast them apart with plasma dischargers! Neighbour growing their hedge to tall? Use your on-board flamethrower to deal with it yourself, and then duel it out... no court action needed here! Cars jamming the roads? Use your built-in ramjets to leap over traffic, buildings and obstacles to carry on your way!

I think we all know that this would propel Britain to a brighter, fuller, far more INTERESTING future.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
